backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control and comprehensive US geography, proposal, and installation data types plus initializers for empty geography structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing a revert-to-Draft-38 task referencing App.tsx and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists summaries for various frontend files including docs, hooks, components, and configuration.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture document outlining Whisper’s vision, hierarchical installation model, ICP canister mapping, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Developer deployment guide with dfx configuration, deployment steps, upgrade workflow, and cycle management practices.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes describing homepage redesign including hero image, contrast fixes, typography, spacing, and visual effects.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Phased development roadmap detailing deliverables and non-goals for progressive Whisper implementation.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Explains registry pattern for Secretary assistant navigation including destinations, actions, and routing behavior.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Manual smoke test checklist for verifying full instance proposal creation and follow-up task workflows in the app.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Design guidelines defining Whisper’s visual style, including colors, typography, and accessibility rules.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing navigation, UI section visibility, and secretary command registration.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Fixed header component displaying the Whisper logo and a Get Started button.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Reusable circular icon container supporting size and color variants.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Shared loading spinner component with optional label and size control.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Form component for creating an instance proposal with name validation and geographic selection.
County dropdown component that loads counties for a selected state and handles errors and loading states.
Dropdown for selecting a place within a county, loading place options via a hook and handling errors or missing county selection.
State selection dropdown that loads all states, maps them into options, and displays errors if fetching fails.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog showing detailed info about an issued project, including overview and tasks tabs with status, description, and geography.
Tasks tab allowing creation and completion toggling of project tasks, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog showing proposal details, allowing admins to approve or reject and optionally open the related issue project.
Section listing all proposals with loading, error handling, auto-open behavior, and a details dialog.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: UI card promoting the Secretary feature with a dismiss button and call-to-action to open it.
UI chat widget that handles user input, keyword-based option matching, and displays messages using secretary chat logic.
Creates a portal to render the SecretaryWidget into an overlay container mounted on the document body.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Provides hooks to check instance-name availability and submit new instance proposals with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Debounces a changing value by a configurable delay to avoid rapid updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity’s AuthClient.
Hooks for fetching tasks, creating tasks, and updating task status for a proposal using backend actor methods.
Custom hook to persist React state to localStorage with SSR guards and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: Preloads an image URL and returns readiness/error flags with console warnings on load failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for parent-child relationship checks, proposal retrieval, and admin status queries using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages secretary chat state, including messages, menu visibility, and helper functions to add or reset messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Provides a registry for navigation destinations with methods to register, find by keyword, and execute navigation actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook to update a proposal's status and invalidate related queries after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React Query hooks for fetching US states, counties, and places from the backend with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theming variables, dark mode, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Formats proposal geography into readable strings and provides labels for hierarchy levels.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines secretary navigation intents, deep link parsing/creation, option metadata, and keyword matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts unknown errors into safe user-facing messages while logging originals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling class-based dark mode, custom color variables, fonts, animations, and plugins for animation and typography.
project_state.json: Project state file describing schema version, current project metadata, and a feature request to revert the codebase to Draft 38.
